remarks: The set of functionals having closed kernels and majorizing the orthocomplement of a given subspace ` R ` is a subspace of the dual space.  TODO:  This proof repeats large parts of the ~ lclkr proof.  Do we achieve overall shortening by breaking them out as subtheorems?  Or make ~ lclkr a special case of this?  (Contributed by NM, 29-Jan-2015.)
